General.Name: Anhui Deli Household Glass Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Deli Household Glass Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells daily glassware products in China. The company offers goblets, bowls and plates, cups, kettle tea maker, machine blowing and printed cups, kitchen supplies, and wine dispenser products, as well as tie-pot water set, catering and tampered cups, ashtray, water utensil, and sealed tank products. It sells its products through online and regional service personnel under the Green Apple, AGLAIA, DeLi, Spele, and Idelita brands; and exports its products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Chuzhou, China.
General.Address: Fengyang County Industrial Park, Chuzhou, China, 233121
